short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nobara Kugisaki wields her hammer as nails spin in a circular motion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Channel the fierce energy of Nobara Kugisaki with this dynamic theme.

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Nobara Kugisaki wielding her signature hammer, surrounded by spinning nails in a dramatic circular motion, set against a bold and striking background.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a modern display that complements Nobara’s fearless aesthetic.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite sites with Nobara’s unyielding determination.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into action-packed games inspired by the intense world of Jujutsu Kaisen.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches while embracing the unstoppable spirit of Nobara.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as bold and sharp as Nobara's combat style.
